text: Muhminkalana ankalaiyum muhminkalana penkalaiyum nir parkkum nalil avarkalutaiya pirakacam avarkalukku munnalum, avarkalukku valappurattilum viraintu kontirukkum, (appotu avarkalai nokki:)"Inru unkalukku nanmarayamavatu cuvarkkattuc colaikalakum, avarrin kile arukal otik kontirukkum, avarril enrenrum tankiyirunkal - itu tan makattana verriyakum" (enru kurappatum)
